_attachments.7026f6e8a8f76f81e0a5ccd296999ae53329b924:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Add a Song in English</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/A7905978-816A-469B-A179-69ABD5EFCC49" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Add a Song in English">
					<play_count />
					<basics>
						<artist />
						<name />
					</basics>
					<ratings>
						<rating />
						<mood />
						<happy />
						<sad />
						<energy />
					</ratings>
				</data>
			</instance>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/play_count" nodeset="/data/play_count" calculate="0" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/basics" nodeset="/data/basics" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/basics/artist" nodeset="/data/basics/artist" type="xsd:string" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/basics/name" nodeset="/data/basics/name" type="xsd:string" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/ratings" nodeset="/data/ratings" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/ratings/rating" nodeset="/data/ratings/rating" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/ratings/mood" nodeset="/data/ratings/mood" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/ratings/happy" nodeset="/data/ratings/happy" vellum:relevant="#form/ratings/mood > 3" relevant="/data/ratings/mood > 3" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/ratings/sad" nodeset="/data/ratings/sad" vellum:relevant="#form/ratings/mood < 3" relevant="/data/ratings/mood < 3" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/ratings/energy" nodeset="/data/ratings/energy" />
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="basics-label">
						<value>Basics</value>
					</text>
					<text id="basics/artist-label">
						<value>Artist</value>
					</text>
					<text id="basics/name-label">
						<value>Name</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings-label">
						<value>Ratings</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/rating-label">
						<value>Rating</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/rating-5-label">
						<value>*****</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/rating-4-label">
						<value>****</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/rating-3-label">
						<value>***</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/rating-2-label">
						<value>**</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/rating-1-label">
						<value>*</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/mood-label">
						<value>Mood</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/mood-5-label">
						<value>*****</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/mood-4-label">
						<value>****</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/mood-3-label">
						<value>***</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/mood-2-label">
						<value>**</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/mood-1-label">
						<value>*</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/happy-label">
						<value>:)</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/sad-label">
						<value>:(</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/energy-label">
						<value>Energy</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/energy-5-label">
						<value>*****</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/energy-4-label">
						<value>****</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/energy-3-label">
						<value>***</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/energy-2-label">
						<value>**</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/energy-1-label">
						<value>*</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
				<translation lang="fra">
					<text id="basics-label">
						<value>Basics</value>
					</text>
					<text id="basics/artist-label">
						<value>Artist</value>
					</text>
					<text id="basics/name-label">
						<value>Name</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings-label">
						<value>Ratings</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/rating-label">
						<value>Rating</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/rating-5-label">
						<value>*****</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/rating-4-label">
						<value>****</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/rating-3-label">
						<value>***</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/rating-2-label">
						<value>**</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/rating-1-label">
						<value>*</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/mood-label">
						<value>Mood</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/mood-5-label">
						<value>*****</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/mood-4-label">
						<value>****</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/mood-3-label">
						<value>***</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/mood-2-label">
						<value>**</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/mood-1-label">
						<value>*</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/happy-label">
						<value>:)</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/sad-label">
						<value>:(</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/energy-label">
						<value>Energy</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/energy-5-label">
						<value>*****</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/energy-4-label">
						<value>****</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/energy-3-label">
						<value>***</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/energy-2-label">
						<value>**</value>
					</text>
					<text id="ratings/energy-1-label">
						<value>*</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<group vellum:ref="#form/basics" ref="/data/basics" appearance="field-list">
			<label ref="jr:itext('basics-label')" />
			<input vellum:ref="#form/basics/artist" ref="/data/basics/artist">
				<label ref="jr:itext('basics/artist-label')" />
			</input>
			<input vellum:ref="#form/basics/name" ref="/data/basics/name">
				<label ref="jr:itext('basics/name-label')" />
			</input>
		</group>
		<group vellum:ref="#form/ratings" ref="/data/ratings" appearance="field-list">
			<label ref="jr:itext('ratings-label')" />
			<select1 vellum:ref="#form/ratings/rating" ref="/data/ratings/rating">
				<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/rating-label')" />
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/rating-5-label')" />
					<value>5</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/rating-4-label')" />
					<value>4</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/rating-3-label')" />
					<value>3</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/rating-2-label')" />
					<value>2</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/rating-1-label')" />
					<value>1</value>
				</item>
			</select1>
			<select1 vellum:ref="#form/ratings/mood" ref="/data/ratings/mood">
				<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/mood-label')" />
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/mood-5-label')" />
					<value>5</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/mood-4-label')" />
					<value>4</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/mood-3-label')" />
					<value>3</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/mood-2-label')" />
					<value>2</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/mood-1-label')" />
					<value>1</value>
				</item>
			</select1>
			<trigger vellum:ref="#form/ratings/happy" ref="/data/ratings/happy" appearance="minimal">
				<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/happy-label')" />
			</trigger>
			<trigger vellum:ref="#form/ratings/sad" ref="/data/ratings/sad" appearance="minimal">
				<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/sad-label')" />
			</trigger>
			<select1 vellum:ref="#form/ratings/energy" ref="/data/ratings/energy">
				<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/energy-label')" />
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/energy-5-label')" />
					<value>5</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/energy-4-label')" />
					<value>4</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/energy-3-label')" />
					<value>3</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/energy-2-label')" />
					<value>2</value>
				</item>
				<item>
					<label ref="jr:itext('ratings/energy-1-label')" />
					<value>1</value>
				</item>
			</select1>
		</group>
	</h:body>
</h:html>

<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>

</h:html>

<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Multimedia - delete me</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/A9DA1F89-7DB3-430C-9DE8-91319F9EB469" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Multimedia - delete me">
					<question1 />
				</data>
			</instance>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/question1" nodeset="/data/question1" type="xsd:string" />
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="question1-label">
						<value>question1</value>
						<value form="image">jr://file/commcare/image/data/question1-fn3fu1.jpg</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
				<translation lang="fra">
					<text id="question1-label">
						<value>question1</value>
						<value form="image">jr://file/commcare/image/data/question1-1ppout.jpg</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/question1" ref="/data/question1">
			<label ref="jr:itext('question1-label')" />
		</input>
	</h:body>
</h:html>

<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">

			</instance>
		</model>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
	</h:body>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Advanced Form, creates show</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/9C159F88-4D44-4821-8597-FC7C74F1670F" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Advanced Form, creates show">
					<something />
					<extra />
				</data>
			</instance>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/something" nodeset="/data/something" type="xsd:string" />
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/extra" nodeset="/data/extra" vellum:calculate="if(#form/something = '', 'blank', 'not blank')" calculate="if(/data/something = '', 'blank', 'not blank')" />
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="something-label">
						<value>something</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
				<translation lang="fra">
					<text id="something-label">
						<value>something</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/something" ref="/data/something">
			<label ref="jr:itext('something-label')" />
		</input>
	</h:body>
</h:html>
_attachments.2ee383d2ce42a9a2742b44a5f963317bb25a805b:
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Followup</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/FE28193E-F894-40C1-833E-2DF7C36D8015" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Followup">
					<how_many_shows/>
					<shows jr:template="">
						<where_is_the_show/>
					</shows>
				</data>
			</instance>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/how_many_shows" nodeset="/data/how_many_shows" type="xsd:int"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/shows" nodeset="/data/shows"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/shows/where_is_the_show" nodeset="/data/shows/where_is_the_show" type="xsd:string"/>
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="how_many_shows-label">
						<value>How many shows on the tour?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="shows-label">
						<value>Shows</value>
					</text>
					<text id="shows/where_is_the_show-label">
						<value>Where is the show?</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
				<translation lang="fra">
					<text id="how_many_shows-label">
						<value>How many shows on the tour?</value>
					</text>
					<text id="shows-label">
						<value>Shows</value>
					</text>
					<text id="shows/where_is_the_show-label">
						<value>Where is the show?</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/how_many_shows" ref="/data/how_many_shows">
			<label ref="jr:itext('how_many_shows-label')"/>
		</input>
		<group>
			<label ref="jr:itext('shows-label')"/>
			<repeat vellum:jr__count="#form/how_many_shows" jr:count="/data/how_many_shows" jr:noAddRemove="true()" vellum:nodeset="#form/shows" nodeset="/data/shows">
				<input vellum:ref="#form/shows/where_is_the_show" ref="/data/shows/where_is_the_show">
					<label ref="jr:itext('shows/where_is_the_show-label')"/>
				</input>
			</repeat>
		</group>
	</h:body>
</h:html>
_attachments.21a1fd427225489bd0875e9d8e8a05edd274c737:

<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">

_attachments.3bdaef979780c478271f164a06fb2d305b6e8583:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title></h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/26EAD9DB-E2DF-49E5-9BB7-F3ED9F1D4122" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Followup Form">
					<default_label />
				</data>
			</instance>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/default_label" nodeset="/data/default_label" />
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="default_label-label">
						<value> This is your follow up form. Delete this label and add questions for any follow up visits. </value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/default_label" ref="/data/default_label" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('default_label-label')" />
		</trigger>
	</h:body>
</h:html>

_attachments.2475d512735f69910712153810614718f8a7ac7d:
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Play a Song</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/A4110A66-4DA2-4096-A134-FF8DC9CAF5CD" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Play a Song">
					<la_la_la/>
					<second_verse/>
					<old_play_count/>
					<new_play_count/>
				</data>
			</instance>
			<instance src="jr://instance/casedb" id="casedb"/>
			<instance src="jr://instance/session" id="commcaresession"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/la_la_la" nodeset="/data/la_la_la"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/second_verse" nodeset="/data/second_verse"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/old_play_count" nodeset="/data/old_play_count"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/new_play_count" nodeset="/data/new_play_count" vellum:calculate="#form/old_play_count + 1" calculate="/data/old_play_count + 1"/>
			<setvalue event="xforms-ready" vellum:ref="#form/old_play_count" ref="/data/old_play_count" vellum:value="#case/play_count" value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/play_count"/>
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="la_la_la-label">
						<value>Sing for me!</value>
						<value form="image">jr://file/commcare/image/data/la_la_la-zvj1k3.jpg</value>
					</text>
					<text id="second_verse-label">
						<value>Second verse!</value>
						<value form="image">jr://file/commcare/image/data/undefined-86sshg.jpg</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
				<translation lang="fra">
					<text id="la_la_la-label">
						<value>Sing for me!</value>
						<value form="image">jr://file/commcare/image/data/la_la_la-zvj1k3.jpg</value>
					</text>
					<text id="second_verse-label">
						<value>Second verse!</value>
						<value form="image">jr://file/commcare/image/data/undefined-86sshg.jpg</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
		<vellum:hashtags>{"#case/play_count":null}</vellum:hashtags>
		<vellum:hashtagTransforms>{"prefixes":{"#case/":"instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/"}}</vellum:hashtagTransforms>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/la_la_la" ref="/data/la_la_la" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('la_la_la-label')"/>
		</trigger>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/second_verse" ref="/data/second_verse" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('second_verse-label')"/>
		</trigger>
	</h:body>
</h:html>

_attachments.72ebcad5bc1800fef28387fa76145ef15a11f1ed:
<h:html xmlns:h="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:orx="http://openrosa.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:jr="http://openrosa.org/javarosa" xmlns:vellum="http://commcarehq.org/xforms/vellum">
	<h:head>
		<h:title>Update Show</h:title>
		<model>
			<instance>
				<data xmlns:jrm="http://dev.commcarehq.org/jr/xforms" xmlns="http://openrosa.org/formdesigner/BD110974-6B46-4CB9-BFBD-ABB400675305" uiVersion="1" version="1" name="Update Show">
					<where_is_the_show/>
					<when_is_the_show/>
				</data>
			</instance>
			<instance src="jr://instance/casedb" id="casedb"/>
			<instance src="jr://instance/session" id="commcaresession"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/where_is_the_show" nodeset="/data/where_is_the_show"/>
			<bind vellum:nodeset="#form/when_is_the_show" nodeset="/data/when_is_the_show" type="xsd:date"/>
			<itext>
				<translation lang="en" default="">
					<text id="where_is_the_show-label">
						<value>This show is in <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> </value>
					</text>
					<text id="when_is_the_show-label">
						<value>When is the show?</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
				<translation lang="fra">
					<text id="where_is_the_show-label">
						<value>This show is in <output value="instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/case_name" vellum:value="#case/case_name"/> </value>
					</text>
					<text id="when_is_the_show-label">
						<value>When is the show?</value>
					</text>
				</translation>
			</itext>
		</model>
		<vellum:hashtags>{"#case/case_name":null}</vellum:hashtags>
		<vellum:hashtagTransforms>{"prefixes":{"#case/parent/":"instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/index/parent]/","#case/":"instance('casedb')/casedb/case[@case_id = instance('commcaresession')/session/data/case_id]/"}}</vellum:hashtagTransforms>
	</h:head>
	<h:body>
		<trigger vellum:ref="#form/where_is_the_show" ref="/data/where_is_the_show" appearance="minimal">
			<label ref="jr:itext('where_is_the_show-label')"/>
		</trigger>
		<input vellum:ref="#form/when_is_the_show" ref="/data/when_is_the_show">
			<label ref="jr:itext('when_is_the_show-label')"/>
		</input>
	</h:body>
</h:html>
